mapper.select: SELECT "user".id AS user_id FROM "user"."user" "user" INNER JOIN "user".member member ON member.user_id = "user".id INNER JOIN "user".group "group" ON "group".id = member.group_id LEFT OUTER JOIN "user".manager manager ON manager.group_id = "group".id LEFT OUTER JOIN "user"."user" managed_members ON managed_members.id = manager.user_id WHERE "user".deleted = false AND "group".deleted = false AND managed_members.deleted = false AND "user".id = #{userId.value}
